QuestData.Title: The Southern Wilds
QuestData.Description: Posted by: Prelate Reenu$B$BNoble friends of the Alliance, the draenei of The Draakorium greet you peacefully.$B$BThe Draakorium is being attacked by enemies from the nearby swamps.$B$BAn Azerothian caravan passed through recently, and may have ventured into dangerous territory.$B$BAny capable adventurer who can assist us with this problem will be rewarded handsomely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Prelate Reenu at The Draakorium.
